configuration.name: 开工6个月未竣工项目--状态
configuration.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (p.c_category=NULL OR p.c_category='') THEN '未知' ELSE p.c_category END c_category,COUNT(p.c_id) c_count FROM t_project p INNER JOIN t_customer c ON c.c_id=p.c_customer_id WHERE DATEDIFF(IFNULL(c_end_date,NOW()),IFNULL(p.c_begin_date,p.c_order_time))>180 AND 1=1 GROUP BY p.c_category
